barker_notes.barker_summary: Juan Martin de Beramendi to Austin et al„ February 15, 1825. Ordering the arrest of a Frenchman, Andrew Valentine, for horse stealing.

*p*To your's the *person_mentioned*juge's citizen's dependant's*/person_mentioned* to the new *location_mentioned*colony*/location_mentioned* and town of*location_mentioned* San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned*, Departments of *location_mentioned*Coahuila and Tejas Estate*/location_mentioned*.—I put in your knowledge in virtu of this my requerant Letter, that divers robbery made in this *location_mentioned*City*/location_mentioned* of drove Horses, and Mules Lately instant this *person_mentioned*citizen*/person_mentioned*'s experiment checks mischief's; at the same time I have had the verification before my *person_mentioned*Tribunal*/person_mentioned*, that the principal author of this excess, was the ingrateful *person_mentioned*foreigner */person_mentioned*French, *person_mentioned*Andrew Valentine*/person_mentioned* with others perverses, they are stealing in differents parts the aforesaid Droves of Horses and Mules, with the indiftenseness to drive into *location_mentioned*United States of America*/location_mentioned*, I am informed that this desertion is for that *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned*, I desire for my part to accomplish with the Laws and oughts of my employ, with what prevents the Laws, and our *person_mentioned*Mexican */person_mentioned*Constitution, I order, require, and charge in name of *location_mentioned*Republica*/location_mentioned*, and for my part I prayer, and request with exaggeration, that immediately you see this requiring, to prepare for reserved way, to all *person_mentioned*inHabitants */person_mentioned*of your's comprehension of this *location_mentioned*new Colony*/location_mentioned*, to take care of straitely and to be with vigilance in all the passages of *location_mentioned*Brazos River*/location_mentioned*, when thinking can cross the *location_mentioned*river*/location_mentioned*, the aforesaid thief *person_mentioned*Andrew Valentin*/person_mentioned*, and his *person_mentioned*companions*/person_mentioned*, as soon can be see towards of this point, to take prisoner with all his company and put in embargo all what carry on, and to send to me immediately under a safe conduct, and so doing you accomplishing with the will of *person_mentioned*Superior Governmt*/person_mentioned*, to whom many times it is assures of your honest process, and of your submission, and obedience to Laws.-—- I trusty in this recommendable circumstances that caracterize you, my heart it is tranquilized, and I believe that the wicked *person_mentioned*ingrateful*/person_mentioned*. *person_mentioned*Valentin*/person_mentioned* will be prisoner in your hands.—And with the object of the assurance, I order for last that be circulated this my aforesaid Letter from juge in juge with the quickness possible until put this in hands of the *person_mentioned*Colonel Estevan Austin Sqse- principal chief of this department,*/person_mentioned* he can dispose the more convenient.*/p*
